headline: Rigetti Roadmap Targets Commercial Quantum Systems As Valuation Flags Undervaluation
summary: Rigetti Computing (NasdaqCM:RGTI) has outlined its updated quantum hardware roadmap, highlighting targets for higher qubit counts and improved fidelity. The company is reporting progress toward commercial grade quantum systems at a time when investor attention is focused on real world performance and use cases. This effort comes as competition intensifies from large technology firms such as Google and IBM, which are also investing heavily in quantum computing hardware. Rigetti focuses on...

headline: Leading bank calls AI threat to enterprise software "illogical," upgrades five stocks for 2026
summary: Wall Street's panic over artificial intelligence replacing enterprise software is misguided, according to HSBC's latest research report. The investment bank argues 2026 marks a crucial shift from AI infrastructure build-out to actual monetisation through software, positioning established...
